Package magellan.client.swing.map

Class AdvancedTextCellRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.client.swing.map.HexCellRenderer
      • magellan.client.swing.map.AbstractTextCellRenderer
        • magellan.client.swing.map.TextCellRenderer
          • magellan.client.swing.map.AdvancedTextCellRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, ContextChangeable, MapCellRenderer, EventListener, GameDataListener
    public class AdvancedTextCellRenderer
extends TextCellRenderer
implements GameDataListener, ContextChangeable, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A slightly improved text cell renderer using the replacer engine of Magellan to create region dependent output. Caches a lot to improve performance, so let the interpreter allocate more memory!
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Andreas
